name: Oscillarium
description:
Oscillarium is a relaxed and forgiving bullet-hell with geometric art synced to music.  Move your cursor to collect the matching color shapes while avoiding the opposite color shapes...or lose yourself in rhythm and geometric patterns.

This is the WIP demo version of the game and in active development.  The full version, containing additional levels, leaderboards, and a custom level editor, will eventually be sold on Steam.  If you would like to be a beta tester and also be the first to know when the full game launches, you can sign up for my mailing list here: https://www.zenmarmotdigital.com/
